description.@en: Flashing out from the darkness, a blade immediately strikes the foe you’re Engaged with.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, the person you touch must Resist with a successful Coordination Test or suffer [[/roll 1D10]]+[WB] in Damage and be unable to use any Movement Actions for one Turn. You can inflict Injuries with this Magick, as if it were a melee weapon.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but the foe also begins to Bleed.

criticalFailure.@en: The scorpion’s tail stings you, instantly dissolving in-hand. You are affected by scorpion’s venom, as indicated in Chapter 9: Hazards & Healing.

reagents.@en: A tail of a scorpion, held in-hand

system.distance: Any one person you can touch
